original_text: And the pots, and the shovels, and the basons: and all these vessels, which Hiram made to king Solomon for the house of the Lord, were of bright brass.
korean_text: 솥과 부삽과 대접들이라 히람이 솔로몬 왕을 위하여 여호와의 성전에 이 모든 그릇을 빛난 놋으로 만드니라

sentences.original_text: And the pots, and the shovels, and the basons:
and all these vessels, which Hiram made
to king Solomon for the house of the Lord,
